1.heading: Tim.
1.title: "Blind Man's Bluff"
1.author: by Ruth Geller ; P
1.appears_in: Karch. p. 3-9 in Treasure Chest of Fun and Fact, v. 13, no. 19 (May 22, 1958).
notes: Begins: "Tim admits Larry was in the plant the night the blueprints were stolen, and agrees to help Matt clear himself by bluffing Larry into revealing his guilt."

2.heading: Tim.
2.title: Hey, Mister : the Fall Collection
2.author: by Pete Sickman-Garner.
notes: "Originally published in comic form as Behind the green food, The trouble with Jesus, Eyes on the prize, and Dial 'M' for Mister."
Collects four issues of the Hey, Mister series.

Summary: "Join Mister, Young Tim, Aunt Mary and the beloved Hideous Mutants as they hurtle headlong out of Eden and try to find redemption in a world where love is a four-letter word and even God gets lonely sometimes."

3.heading: Tim.
3.title: "1 + 1 = 2" 6 p. in Around the World
3.author: Paya & Paya.
notes: Summary: Nina goes to a party and meets twin men named Tim and Tom, who are experts as a dance team. After the party Nina discovers that they are experts as a sex team as well.
